txt.en: 'Now that everyone is here, we must meet to figure out how to fight this Bârshud and oppose his considerable forces.\n\n'I dread this part, [placeholder]. I am no good at negotiating, and worse at diplomacy. Yet here we are. We should go inside and join the others.'
Speak with Mizâdi in Iridír when you are ready to go

'That went as well as I expected. I wish I chose my words more carefully, but it is something for which I never developed the talent.\n\n'At least we now have a plan for moving against Bârshud. Thank you for your part in aiding us, friend.'
You have brought the leaders of Ambarûl, Khûd Zagin, and Imhûlar together in Iridír. Mizâdi has much to do before Girhâzi and Amalíbi trust her or her leadership.
The Sickle, the Lotus, and the Lion
'Let us go into the hall and have words with the others. The sooner we do so the sooner we can act to counter this Bârshud.'
Speak with Mizâdi in Iridír when you are ready to go.
